steps.title: Tune deterministic scoring
steps.text: This page lets you tune deterministic signal scores for assignments: your stack, extra rules, and a live breakdown.

steps.title: Set your target stack
steps.text: Add or edit target technologies and optional per-tech scores. Toggle editing to adjust weights; rarity badges come from system popularity.

steps.title: Additional signal rules
steps.text: Each rule saves inline. Scoring mode adds/subtracts points; inclusion/exclusion act as gates. Coverage bars show how often a rule applies.

steps.title: LLM recommendation + quota fill
steps.text: Use Update now to refresh recommendations. The quota bar combines recent tech-matched jobs to project monthly throughput vs your limit.

steps.title: Inspect a scoring path
steps.text: Pick a representative job to see deterministic rule contributions, reasons, and timing. The total badge mirrors what assignments use.

steps.title: Replay anytime
steps.text: Use the question mark in the corner to reopen this walkthrough later. We only auto-show when the content changes or you have not seen it yet.
